info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Lincoln, central Cleveland and northwestern Gaston Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Shelby, or near Lawndale, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belwood, Lawndale, Fallston, Cherryville, Polkville, Crouse and Vale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
